com.manyangled.gibbous.optim.convex

Class QuadraticFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.manyangled.gibbous.optim.convex.TwiceDifferentiableFunction
      • com.manyangled.gibbous.optim.convex.QuadraticFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateFunction

    public class QuadraticFunction
extends TwiceDifferentiableFunction
    Given A, b, c, implements 0.5*(x^T)A(x) + b.x + c; The gradient is A(x) + b, and the Hessian is A

        c - a constant

      • nBallConstraintFunction

        public static QuadraticFunction nBallConstraintFunction(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector center,
                                                        double r,
                                                        double s)
        Create a quadratic function that corresponds to s(x-c).s(x-c) < r^2. That is, constrained to an n-dimensional ball of radius r, with scaling factor s.
        Parameters:
        center - the center of the n-ball
        r - a radius, > 0
        s - a scaling constant, > 0
        Returns:
        quadratic constraint function for the n-ball constraint
